text: Agar tu ej Pajomʙar, az imon naovardani kuffor ʙa'di didani hamai in ojotho dar taaççuʙ meoī, pas taaççuʙ dar suxani onhost, ki megūjand: ojo on hangom ki xok şavem, az nav moro ʙijofarinad? Inho ʙa Parvardigoraşon imon nadorand va dar rūzi qijomat ʙar gardanhojaşon zançirho ʙoşad va ahli çahannamand va dar on çovidonand
